1 REMARK                 PATTERNS IIII 
4 RUN 100
8 RUN 290
12 RUN 320
16 RUN 350
20 RUN 380
24 RUN 410
28 RUN 440
32 RUN 470
36 RUN 500
40 RUN 530
44 RUN 560
48 RUN 590
52 RUN 620
56 RUN 650
60 RUN 680
64 RUN 710
68 RUN 740
72 RUN 770
76 RUN 800
80 RUN 830
100 INIT 
110 PAGE 
120 PRINT "Push the `CTRL' (CONTROL) key to change the pattern."
130 FOR I=1 TO 200
140 NEXT I
150 DIM A$(478),B$(64)
160 REM * TO DISABLE STORAGE, CHANGE THIS LOCATION TO 04 *
170 A$="017?00:87?00:97?00::7?00:;<>0364;=<;;?;687::8:00;7"
180 A$=A$&"87::860197:5:60097:::60897:;:61097:8:61897:9;=<;81"
190 A$=A$&"<>0364;687::8402260139:608>6006=302714:020<2002404"
200 A$=A$&"4?5?6330:70897:;>700=7::2016:;20<900<1032?0686??<6"
210 A$=A$&"036330:70897:;>700=7:::618>6106=382714:028<2002404"
220 A$=A$&"4?5?6338:71897:9>710=7:82016:;28<900<1022?0686??<6"
230 A$=A$&"026338:71897:9>710=7:87?00:5;=<;81088<036<2785208>"
240 A$=A$&"0203000302000300000?810?00?17??1"
250 A$=A$&"0200010200020100?>707?8>008>7?70"
260 A$=A$&"04040404040404040404040404040404"
270 A$=A$&"00000000000000000000000000000000"
280 CALL "EXEC",A$
290 B$="01030507090;0=0?0?0=0;0907050301"
300 B$=B$&"00??00??00??00????00??00??00??00"
310 GOSUB 940
320 B$="00000800000008000800000008000000"
330 B$=B$&"000000000000??00??00000000000000"
340 GOSUB 940
350 B$="00040604000406040604000406040004"
360 B$=B$&"00??00??0000??00??0000??00??0000"
370 GOSUB 940
380 B$="00080<0800080<080:0700070:070007"
390 B$=B$&"00??00??0000??00??0000??00??0000"
400 GOSUB 940
410 B$="00020802000208020802000208020002"
420 B$=B$&"00??00??0000??00??0000??00??0000"
430 GOSUB 940
440 B$="00040004000400040004000400040004"
450 B$=B$&"00??00??00000000000000??00??0000"
460 GOSUB 940
470 B$="02030403020304030503030505030305"
480 B$=B$&"00??00????00??00??0000??00????00"
490 GOSUB 940
500 B$="02040604020406040503030505030305"
510 B$=B$&"??00??0000??00??00????00??0000??"
520 GOSUB 940
530 B$="01020304050607080807060504030201"
540 B$=B$&"00??00??00??00????00??00??00??00"
550 GOSUB 940
560 B$="0203030302000000000?7?0?00?181?1"
570 B$=B$&"0202010000000102?>8>7?7000707?8>"
580 GOSUB 890
590 B$="0203030302000000000?7?0?00?181?1"
600 B$=B$&"0202010000000102?>8>7?7000707?8>"
610 GOSUB 890
620 B$="020203020201000100;?7?;?00418141"
630 B$=B$&"0202010000000102?>3>7?;?00;?7?3>"
640 GOSUB 890
650 B$="020203020201000100;?7?;?00418141"
660 B$=B$&"0202010000000102?>3>7?;?00;?7?3>"
670 GOSUB 890
680 B$="0202030202010001005?7?5?00:081:0"
690 B$=B$&"0201010100010101?>=>7?2000207?=>"
700 GOSUB 890
710 B$="0202030202010001005?7?5?00:081:0"
720 B$=B$&"0201010100010101?>=>7?2000207?=>"
730 GOSUB 890
740 B$="0203030200020200000?0?00?10000?1"
750 B$=B$&"0202000000000202?>8>70>070001>8>"
760 GOSUB 890
770 B$="0203030200020200000?0?00?10000?1"
780 B$=B$&"0202000000000202?>8>70>070001>8>"
790 GOSUB 890
800 B$="0202010202010201008740870078;?78"
810 B$=B$&"02000102000201003>?77>06;?067>?7"
820 GOSUB 890
830 B$="0202010202010201008740870078;?78"
840 B$=B$&"02000102000201003>?77>06;?067>?7"
850 GOSUB 890
860 PRINT "";
870 PAGE 
880 END 
890 REMARK  UPDATE PATTERN SHAPE  (X MSB, X LSB, YMSB, Y LSB)
900 PAGE 
910 A$=REP(B$,351,64)
920 CALL "EXEC",A$
930 RETURN 
940 REMARK  UPDATE PATTERN DYNAMICS  (X MAG, Y MAG, X SGN, Y SGN)
950 PAGE 
960 A$=REP(B$,415,64)
970 CALL "EXEC",A$
980 RETURN
